Question: Which of the following statements are true regarding the production of the movie 'No Entry' (2005)?
Options:
A. 'No Entry' was speculated to be a remake of 'Masti' (2004).
B. 'No Entry' is a direct sequel to 'Masti' (2004).
C. Producer Boney Kapoor denied the similarities between 'No Entry' and 'Masti'.
D. 'No Entry' is a remake of the Tamil movie 'Charlie Chaplin' (2002).
